tidbits.title: Rich Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: Japan has a rich cultural heritage, from ancient traditions like tea ceremonies and kabuki to modern innovations in technology and fashion.

tidbits.title: Natural Beauty
tidbits.description: The country boasts natural beauty with serene landscapes, cherry blossoms, historic temples, and majestic mountains like Mount Fuji.

tidbits.title: Cuisine and Culinary Arts
tidbits.description: Japanese cuisine, including sushi, ramen, and tempura, is globally renowned, emphasizing fresh ingredients and culinary precision.
